enroll: Not eligible for College Credit Plus program
description: Syntax and pragmatics of C++ programming; C++ types, arrays, classes, pointers; objects and classes; compile-time vs. run-time picture; inheritance; template classes.Prereq: 2123 or 2231; and 2321; and enrollment in CSE, CIS, ECE, Engr Physics, or Data Analytics major, or CIS minor. Not open to students with credit for 2122. This course is graded S/U.
